infotext.locationchange.outpost.changeto.abandone: We have lost contact with [previousname] unexpectedly. We advise you to investigate with caution.
The beacon station nearby [previousname] recieved an automated SOS broadcast from the station, but no further communication has been recieved.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. No survivors have been found.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. Survivors are being extracted via shuttle.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.waypoint: [previousname] has a good chunk of space to set up an outpost.
The Coalition has marked [previousname] as a good location to colonize.
infotext.locationchange.lair.changeto.none: [previousname] has been cleared out by the surrounding coalition military forces.
infotext.locationchange.UnderAttack.changeto.bloc: The Coalition is setting up a blockade at [previousname].
The Coalition is moving troops to [previousname].
The Coalition is garrisoning troops at [previousname].
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.c1: "COALITION BOUNTY ISSUED", the discolored and damaged posters list off sites of destruction and infestation, seems like the coalition is in over their heads. You can only make out one set of coordinates.
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.o1: A tax free paycheck couldn't hurt...
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_lair.c1: “There is a massive lair nearby bubbling over with more and more creatures by the minute, if you can take it out there is a reward in it for you!”
